snippet: A new campaign for Revel, a resort and casino in Atlantic City, plays down the gambling aspect and focuses on food, music and leisure.
lead_paragraph: A new campaign for Revel, a resort and casino in Atlantic City, plays down the gambling aspect and focuses on food, music and leisure.

headline.seo: Revel Has Dinner, Drinks, Swimming and Gambling, Too — Campaign Spotlight
headline.main: We Have Dinner, Drinks, Swimming ...Oh, and Gambling, Too
headline.print_headline: We Have Dinner, Drinks, Swimming ...Oh, and Gambling, Too
